Source: Reward for inviting Freminet to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1112]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1112] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11122]</color> once.
After your $[A1112], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 1 card. (Twice per Round)
(You must have $[A1112] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
